Specifically, I am interested in learning about its task management capabilities, such as creating and assigning tasks, setting deadlines, and tracking progress. Additionally, I would appreciate information on the collaboration tools, real-time communication, and file sharing features My name is Jane Smith.. Could you also provide information on the reporting and analytics tools available?
